DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate MK0476 and Fluticasone to control asthma in patients with mild persistent asthma.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate MK0476 and Fluticasone to Control Asthma in Patients With Mild Persistent Asthma (0476-910)
DOC.criteria: Patient is male or female, 614 years of age with mild persistent asthma Patient has a history of the following symptoms: wheezing, chest tightness, cough, etc. Patient has asthma diagnosed by a doctor Patient is hospitalized Patient has had major surgery or participated in another clinical trial in the last 4 weeks Patient has been on a breathing tube for asthma
